## intToRoman variable

将有效整型数字转为罗马数字

**Signature:**

```typescript
intToRoman: (val: number) => string
```

## Example 1


```ts
romanToInt(1900);
'MCM'

```

## Example 2


```ts
romanToInt(1);
'I'
```

## Example 3


```ts
romanToInt(3);
'III'
```

## Example 4


```ts
romanToInt(9999);
'MMMMMMMMMCMXCIX'
```
